EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / Eugene Tipenko (1352156434.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Eugene Tipenko (1352156434.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Eugene, Thank you for the update. I’ve enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful in finding your next project. - Here is a short list of some of our top clients within MBO Access <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Access_Information.pdf>. - In addition, we have an index of recorded Webinars that will comprehensively cover everything to do with working independently. You can see them by going here <http://www.mbopartners.com/resources>. - Lastly, you can view all the information about the MBO program by going here. <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html> (Please bookmark this page.) I will follow up with you, if you have questions before then, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule. <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS> Best of luck finding your next contract, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Eugene Tipen [mailto:etipenko@gmail.com] Sent: Monday, November 05, 2012 3:41 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Eugene Tipenko Hi Sara, nice to hearing from you. My current contract will be done by November 23/2012, so looking for a new one now..SincerelyEugene TipenkoOn Sat, Oct 27, 2012 at 9:33 AM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote: Hello Eugene, I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding the services provided by MBO Partners. You mentioned you may be starting a new consulting contract. How is that going? Here are a few tools that summarize our conversation from before: - There are some webinars and videos we have created that might assist you in finding your next contract if you have not already found one:
http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC00NDImbWVzc2FnZWlkPTQ0MiZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNDgyMjcyMTQmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUwMzUyMTcmZW1haWxpZD1ldGlwZW5rb0BnbWFpbC5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTI2MzgyLTk0MzMyLTEmZXh0cmE9JiYm&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx7%2B8uW7Hr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDRdQhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X> - MBO Partners continues to invest in being a leader for independent consultants across the country. I also wanted to share the news that we released a study you may be interested in. For the first time, there’s real hard facts about The State of Independence in America <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC00NDImbWVzc2FnZWlkPTQ0MiZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNDgyMjcyMTQmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUwMzUyMTcmZW1haWxpZD1ldGlwZW5rb0BnbWFpbC5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTI2MzgyLTk0MzMyLTEmZXh0cmE9JiYm&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/stateofindependence?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx7%2B8uW7Hr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDRdQhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X> that will reveal not just how many millions of independent professionals there are in the country, but also the unique things that motivate them and help them stay happily independent.
Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you. Regards,Sara___________________________________Sara Conde Consultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: (703) 793-6028 <tel:%28703%29%20793-6028>f: 703-793-6070 <tel:703-793-6070>e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC00NDImbWVzc2FnZWlkPTQ0MiZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNDgyMjcyMTQmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUwMzUyMTcmZW1haWxpZD1ldGlwZW5rb0BnbWFpbC5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTI2MzgyLTk0MzMyLTEmZXh0cmE9JiYm&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx7%2B8uW7Hr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YEDRdQhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X>
